title: IBM Cloud速 Databases for MongoDB docs
introduction: MongoDB is a JSON document store with a rich query and aggregation framework.

section_recommended.title: Getting Started
section_recommended.description: A brief tutorial to introduce using an IBM Cloud速 Databases for MongoDB deployment.

section_recommended.title: Setting the Admin Password
section_recommended.description: The IBM Cloud速 Databases for MongoDB service is provisioned with a admin user. You must set the admin password before you use it to connect.

section_recommended.title: Getting Connection Strings
section_recommended.description: To connect to IBM Cloud速 Databases for MongoDB, you need some users and connection strings.

tiles.title: Databases for MongoDB version 6 released
tiles.description: Databases for MongoDB version 6 is now available. For more information, see Upgrading to a new Major Version.

tiles.title: Databases for MongoDB Plans documentation
tiles.description: Databases for MongoDB Plans documentation created.

tiles.title: Databases for MongoDB end of life dates
tiles.description: End of life announcement: Version 4.2 reaches end of life July 2023. Version 4.4 reaches end of life 26 April 2024. Version 5 reaches end of life September 2024. All Databases for MongoDB instances on deprecated versions that are still active will be upgraded in-place to the next major version. We recommend that you upgrade following our backup and restore process before the EOL date of your version.
